title: BikeRadar Podcast | MTB Bike of the Year special
content:
Our Bike of the Year test is always a big undertaking and this year, for reasons which should be fairly obvious, was no exception!

In this episode, BikeRadar’s technical editors talk through the process of testing eight trail and eight enduro bikes, and detail the bikes that stood out, including the two eventual Bike of the Year winners.

Don’t forget, you can get £5 off your first Coffee Plan with Pact Coffee by using the code ‘bikeradar’ at the checkout!
